name: TalkButler
_source: s;Simon;Has Lord Ebert prepared to receive us?
s;OldVillager2;He is wrapping up some important business.{w}{br}Would you like me to lead you to him once he is ready?
s;OldVillager2;Lord Ebert is prepared to meet with you. Please, come with me.
s;OldVillager2;Milord, I present Lord Simon Verstadt and Lady Anuki Morrissey.
s;Ebert;What a surprise! Lord Verstadt and his lovely fiance.{w}{br}To what do I owe this pleasure?
s;Simon;Does this ledger look familiar, Ebert?
s;Simon;So you deny funding the New Dawn?
s;Ebert;I suppose I needn't bother.{w} You would eventually uncover further evidence anyway.
s;Ebert;Because I hedge my bets.{w} I apologize, Simon,{w}{br}but I had little reason to back a fledgling lord.{w}{br}Especially one with the mess your father left you with.
s;Simon;You style yourself a noble, yet fund anarchists. How ironic.
s;Ebert;Those anarchists were far from my land. And they didn't complain.{w}{br}It is all politics, boy.{w}{br}One day you'll understand.
s;Simon;You will pay for this, Ebert. I won't let you escape justice.
s;Ebert;Justice! Now you sound like an anarchist.{w}{br}Besides, what would your patron say?
s;Anuki;We have no problem with it.
s;Ebert;Hah! What a lovely couple.{w}{br}Guards, to me!
s;Ebert;Whoever brings their heads on a pike will get a generous bonus!
